engage(Activity, String) - Static method in class com.apptentive.android.sdk.Apptentive
This method takes a unique event string, stores a record of that event having been visited, figures out if there is an interaction that is able to run for this event, and then runs it.

W

willShowInteraction(Context, String) - Static method in class com.apptentive.android.sdk.Apptentive
This method can be used to determine if a call to one of the engage() methods such as Apptentive.engage(android.app.Activity, String) using the same event name will result in the display of an Interaction.
